banner.text:
=> Meteor 0.9.4 is out with improved PhoneGap/Cordova support, speedups for the
   packaging system, several backwards-compatible API changes, and some new
   features: a new meteor debug command, an option for running Velocity tests with
   the command line tool, and a new configuration file for specifying mobile app
   metadata, icons, and splash screens.

   Meteor 0.9.4 is being downloaded in the background. You can update to
   it by running 'meteor update'.
